OPOilExtractor.Description: Escort mission extractor now has 10 meter range, 0.25 melt time (down .2 seconds), and 0.15 chunk pickup (down .3 seconds), you can also run with it.

SnowMelter.Description: Makes CRSPR have an insane carve for snow, ice, engie plat, and organic matter. Causes considerable lad and client de-sync, use with caution. Works on both U32 and U33

PeculiarShades.Description: Replaces both Industrial Goggles and Mighty Muttonchops with sunglasses

BeastMasterBuff.Description: Steeve seems too fragile these days. Tame time .75s > .1s, Cooldown 5 mins > 90s, movement speed 1.15 > 1.3

PointlessShieldDisruption.Description: Shield Disruption will no longer affect gameplay, Red Sugar Occurrence 2x > 1x, Shield 0x > 1x, Damage Reduction 0.7x > 1x, and Hazard Bonus 30% > 0%. Works on both U32 and U33

DontPetSteeve.Description: Steeve is unable to be pet and won't get in the way of revives. Works for both U32 and 33

PepegaGunner.Description: Makes the Gunners Leadstorm super op, 99999 Ammo, 10000 rps, 1 Bullet Per Shot, No Recoil, No Spread, .25s Equip Duration, 10s Barrel Spindown, 10x Cooldown speed, No carve, 0.25s Overheat Duration, 1x Movement Speed, 200% Armor Breaking, and 200% Weakpoint Dmg.

NoReviving.Description: Makes it literally impossible to revive, excluding FM and IW. (Works on both U32 & 33)
